title: 83/459/EEC: Commission Decision of 4 July 1983 supplementing Decision 79/833/EEC and laying down, for the purposes of the survey on the structure of agricultural holdings for 1979/80, the Community outline of a schedule of tables, the standard code and rules for the transcription on to magnetic tape of the data contained in those tables
header:
( 1 ) OJ NO L 35 , 4 . 2 . 1978 , P . 1 .
( 2 ) OJ NO L 259 , 15 . 10 . 1979 , P . 45 .
( 3 ) OJ NO L 194 , 28 . 7 . 1980 , P . 19 .
COMMISSION DECISION OF 4 JULY 1983 SUPPLEMENTING DECISION 79/833/EEC AND LAYING DOWN , FOR THE PURPOSES OF THE SURVEY ON THE STRUCTURE OF AGRICULTURAL HOLDINGS FOR 1979/80 , THE COMMUNITY OUTLINE OF A SCHEDULE OF TABLES , THE STANDARD CODE AND RULES FOR THE TRANSCRIPTION ON TO MAGNETIC TAPE OF THE DATA CONTAINED IN THOSE TABLES ( 83/459/EEC )
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: THE TABLES SET OUT IN ANNEX 1 ARE HEREBY ADDED TO ANNEX 1 TO DECISION 79/833/EEC .
THE TABLE SET OUT IN ANNEX 2 IS HEREBY ADDED TO ANNEX 4 TO DECISION 79/833/EEC .
THIS DECISION IS ADDRESSED TO THE MEMBER STATES .
attachments:
DONE AT BRUSSELS , 4 JULY 1983 .
FOR THE COMMISSION
RICHARD BURKE
MEMBER OF THE COMMISSION
ANNEXES : SEE OJ NO L 251 OF 12 . 9 . 1983 .
